title: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader - Limited Outfit (Steam) Giveaway
description: Claim your free Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader - Limited Outfit (DLC) via Steam! This DLC unlocks 1 Exclusive Rogue Trader Mask and 1 Magnificent Rogue Trader Cloak. Hurry before it vanishes!
instructions:
1. Download the base game via Steam (required).
2. Download this free DLC directly via Steam before January 31st, 2024.

title: World of Tanks - A Present From Vinnie Pack (Steam) Giveaway
description: Celebrate holidays with this free time-limited Gift Pack DLC for World of Tanks! Each pack unlocks 50 of each Holiday Ops resource (Meteoric Iron, Pure Emerald, Rock Crystal, and Warm Amber) and 3 "Present from Vinnie" decals. Just make sure to claim the DLC Pack by January 8, 2024!
instructions:
1. Download directly via Steam before the offer expires.
2. Don't forget to install the base game World of Tanks (free-to-play) to enjoy this DLC content.

title: Exoprimal: Alienware Decal Steam Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Exoprimal: Alienware Decal Steam Key and customize your exosuit! Please note the base game Exoprimal is required to enjoy this content.
instructions:
1. Log in or register to your free Alienware account.
2. Click the button to unlock your free Steam key.
3. Launch the Steam client and click the Games menu option.
4. Choose "activate a Product on Steam" to redeem your Steam key.

title: Divine Knockout Serious Business Hercules Skin Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Divine Knockout Skin Key and unlock the Serious Business Skin for Hercules! Please note the base game Divine Knockout (free-to-play) is required to enjoy this add-on content.
instructions:
1. Log in or register to your free Alienware Arena account.
2. Click the button to unlock your key and follow the giveaway instructions.

title: Century: Age of Ashes Aldrüni Pack Key Giveaway
description: Score a free Century: Age of Ashes Aldrüni Pack key and unlock the Aldrüni Shrines Dragon and 300 Gems. Are you ready to rule the skies?
instructions:
1. Log in or register to your free Alienware Arena account.
2. Click the button to unlock your key and follow the giveaway instructions.
platforms: PC, Steam, Epic Games Store, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Android, iOS

title: Age of Wonders 4: Special Godir Helmet Steam Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Age of Wonders 4: Special Godir Helmet Steam Key! To grab a key you just need to subscribe to their newsletter! That's it! Please note the base game Age of Wonders 4 is required to enjoy this DLC content.
instructions:
1. Subscribe to their newsletter and grab your Steam key.
2. Launch the Steam client and click the Games menu option.
3. Choose "activate a Product on Steam" to redeem your Steam key.

title: World of Tanks: Free Supplies Pack (Steam)
description: Get your free World of Tanks: Free Supplies Pack via Steam and unlock 150,000 credits, 3 days of WoT Premium Account and much more!
instructions:
1. Download this pack directly via Steam before expires.
2. Please note the base game World of Tanks (free-to-play) is required to enjoy this content.

title: World of Warplanes: Curtiss XP-31 Pack (Steam)
description: Claim your free World of Warplanes: Curtiss XP-31 Pack on Steam and unlock the American Curtiss XP-31 Tier II premium fighter. In addition, you will receive 3 days of Premium account, a stock of supply crates and a thematic emblem that gives a bonus.
instructions:
1. Download this pack directly via Steam before expires.
2. Please note the base game World of Warplanes (free-to-play) is required to enjoy this content.

title: Fangs Heroic Founder's Pack Key Giveaway
description: Score Fangs Heroic Founder's Pack Key and unlock lots of in-game items for Fangs including 14 Heroes, 1,000 Realm Gold, Season Zero Battle Pass and much more!
instructions:
1. Login into your free Alienware Arena account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key (Please note the key must be redeemed in-game).

title: Realm Royale - We're Bok! Bundle DLC (Steam)
description: To Celebrate the relaunch of Realm Royale Reforged you can grab the Realm Royale We're Bok! Bundle DLC, free for a limited time via Steam! This bundle unlocks the Khale the Divine Mage Skin and the Lucy-Purr Chicken Skin.
instructions:
1. Download this DLC directly via Steam before the offer expires.
2. Please note the base game Realm Royale Reforged (free-to-play) is required to enjoy this DLC content.

title: Thunder League Online: Free Points Key Giveaway
description: Grab a free Thunder League Online bundle of 1,000 Thunder Points (in-game currency). Thunder Points can be used to purchase anything from the in-game shop!
instructions:
1. Login into your free Alienware account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

title: Destiny 2: Be True Emblem Code
description:
Claim your Destiny 2: Be True Emblem Code for free! Find the code below and follow the instructions to redeem your Emblem code.

CODE: ML3-FD4-ND9
instructions:
1. Navigate to the Destiny 2 code redemption page (click on the "Get Loot" button).
2. Choose your platform, sign in to your platform account, then just add your code and redeem it.
platforms: PC, Steam, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One

title: Free NiGHTS Into Dreams (Steam) Giveaway
description: Grab NiGHTS Into Dreams for free! That's right, Sega is celebrating their 60th anniversary and they are giving away NiGHTS Into Dreams entirely for free! To grab your copy you just need to sign up with your email and Steam account. It's that easy!
instructions:
1. Sign in with your email and click continue.
2. Login with your Steam account.

title: SUPER CIRCUIT BREAKERS - PAYNE
